attributes.action: Legislate to require Keyna Bintcliffe to finish her sentences and allow others to finish theirs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mrs Bincliffe is well-known for not finishing her own sentences nor allowing others to finish theirs. Those who know her consider it an appropriate that there be a statutory requirement for her to do so.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
